name: REIT VNQ Recession and Recovery Analysis
question: How has the Vanguard Real Estate ETF (VNQ) performed during recessions and recoveries?
retailQuestion: Should I buy real estate stocks during economic downturns?
description: Analyzes VNQ performance during the 2008-2009 recession, COVID-19 pandemic, and other economic downturns over 15 years. Examines REIT behavior during interest rate cycles, recession periods, and recovery phases to evaluate real estate as a defensive or cyclical investment.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get 15+ years of VNQ data covering multiple economic cycles
Step 2: Get current VNQ market data for latest cycle context
Step 3: Identify recession periods and analyze VNQ performance patterns
Step 4: Compare VNQ vs SPY during economic stress and recovery periods
Step 5: Evaluate REITs as recession hedge vs growth investment

followUp: Are REITs a good hedge against economic downturns?
Should I buy real estate stocks when interest rates are falling?
How much real estate exposure should I have in my portfolio?
Do REITs behave more like stocks or bonds during crises?
